name: Black And White (Denis)
description:
Black and White is a game we made at the Berlin Mini Game Jam on 2014-08-31.

The gameplay is pretty basic. Don't expect to have too much fun :)

up/down arrow: move birds
space: shoot

Art: Sven Ahlgrimm
Music: Sebastian Grillmaier
Programming: Denis Defreyne

Source available at github.com/ddfreyne/black-and-white.
